===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# A former [[dynasty]] in [[China]], reigning from the end of the [[:w:Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms|Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms]] to the beginning of the [[Yuan]]
#: {{zh-l|宋朝|Song dynasty}}
# A former [[empire]] in [[China]], occupying the eastern half of modern [[China]]
# The era of Chinese history during which the dynasty reigned
# ''A [[surname]]'', listed 118th in the ''[[:w:Baijiaxing|Baijiaxing]]''
